free: #e Did all your children come home?
#c 妳的小孩都回來了嗎？
#e (No,) they didn’t. They are all married and returned to the hometown of their spouse in the south.
#c 沒有回來，她們都嫁了，回到南邊（男方）的家。
#e To the home of their spouse. T: Oh, didn’t (they) come home?　P: Yesterday, they visited, (but) left (right away).
#c 回到夫婿的家。T: 啊，沒回到家來嗎？P: 昨天有回來拜訪之後就回去了。
#e P: They would probably come (again) tomorrow night. T: Oh, have you finished (cleaning up your ancestors’) tombs?
#c P: 可能明天晚上又回來了。 T: 妳們掃墓結束了嗎？
#e Not yet, we’re still cleaning. A few days ago we cleaned Mother’s and Father’s tombs.
#c 還沒，我們現在還在整理墳墓。幾天前我們整理、翻修媽媽爸爸的墳墓。
#e The cement cracked and so water leaked inside.
#c 鋼筋水泥裂了，水滲進裡面了。
#e Right, ours also cracked.
#c 是的，一樣，我們的也裂了。
#e We have started to work a few days ago.
#c 我們前幾天翻修。
#e We should be able to finish today. Once we are done, we will kill a pig (today).
#c 今天要完工了。工作完成，趁這個機會（子女都回來），我們今天要殺豬。
#e Good!
#c 哦，很好阿。
#e Right!
#c 是的。
#e Have you finished this morning?
#c 早上做好了嗎，還沒好嗎？
#e We would finish today.
#c 今天說是會完成。
#e We already killed a pig this morning.
#c 所以今天要殺豬，早上就殺了。
#e That’s good.
#c 喔，那很好阿。
#e Aciang and Namuh bought the pig.
#c Aciang跟Namuh負責買那頭豬。
#e Ofad invited them (for lunch) there.
#c 所以Ofad叫他們吃午餐，就在那邊吃了。
#n ati’可以直接用於口語，叫人家「過來」的意思。
#e T: Just now? P: Right!
#c T: 剛才嗎？ P: 是阿。
#e So (you’re) going there for dinner later?
#c 等一下還要去哪裡吃晚餐？
#e T: We are going (to clean up) the tombs at 8 o’clock tomorrow. P: To (clean up) the tombs?
#c T: 我們的是明天早上八點去墳墓。 P: 去掃墓嗎？
#e Why?
#c 為什麼呢？
#e The children don’t have time to come home.
#c 那些小孩沒有時間回來。
#e Nufu (and his family) just came from Taitung.
#c Nufu一家人剛剛從台東回來。
#e Didn’t Hekaw come home?
#c Hekaw一家人沒有回來嗎？
#e (They) didn’t come home; they didn’t have time.
#c 他沒回來，沒有時間。
#e Aren’t you tired doing this?
#c 做這一件事你不會累嗎？
#e No, I like to listen.
#c 不會，我喜歡聽。
#e That’s good.
#c 那很好。
#e But I can’t explain in Chinese.
#c 只是，不會用漢語解釋。
#n mi-sa-heci這裡作為「解釋」之意。
#e If there is something I don’t know, lots of repetitions, right?
#c 如果有不會的地方，持續反反覆覆的說，是不是？
#e Me too.
#c 我也是。
#e Although I know Mandarin, (they) would say, ’Like this? Like this?’.
#c 我雖然會說國語，他們說「這樣子、這樣子」。
#e There are some (answers) that I know.
#c 有我所知道的。
#e If I don’t know and when I am thinking, they would say, ‘Can’t we say this?’
#c 其次，如果有我不知道，正在思索的時候，他們說「不可以這樣子嗎？」
#e And (they) had the answer.
#c 結果，答案對了（找到答案了）。
#e They found an answer by themselves.
#c 結果（將其中涵義）表達出來的人也是他們自己。
#n pa-tala-hekar-ay 「表達」。
#e I wouls day, ‘Right, like that’.
#c （我就會說）「是的，就是這樣，如此如此。」
#e I have the same experience.
#c 我也有同樣的情形在他們身上。
#e T: That’s good! P: Yes, but it's easier this time.
#c T: 很好啊。 P: 是，不過這次（問題）比較簡單。
#e Not like the two, when I just started, this (collecting data) is easy.
#c 不像那二個人，我剛開始的時候，做這個（採集）很容易。
#e Even though (you) cannot find an answer, regardless of how much you know,(you) can express it.
#c 雖然答非所問，如果你了解多少，就表達出來。
#e If the meaning is close, I did so too.
#c 如果意思很接近，剛剛好的，我也是這樣子做。
#e If the expression is close, I do it like this, but I’m not able to help with the others.
#c （表達內涵）很接近了的時候，我是這樣子做，其他的方式也無法勝任了。
#n hiya 指採集時被問到的其他問題。
#e Then, if we translate it into Amis, if we have to (conform to) Chinese, (the expression would) sound awkward.
#c 其次，如果我們翻譯成阿美語，如果我們硬要符合漢語的話，聽起來硬梆梆的。
#e Yes.
#c 對。
#e Our style of expression is more direct.
#c 我們的話很直接。
#e Yes.
#c 沒錯
#e If there is an easier part, it’s just like this.
#c 如果哪個地方比較簡單的，僅僅如此作採集工作。
#e They come here to learn.
#c 那個他們專程來這裡學習。
#e They want to learn Amis; otherwise, they want to do research.
#c 他們想要學會說阿美語，如果不是的話，他們是來研究的。
#e P: They do research. T: I think so.
#c P: 他們做研究。 T: 我認為是如此。
#e P: Right, for research. T: (They) really listen to (you). P: Right.
#c P: 是的，(目的)是研究。 T: 詳細的聽了。 P: 是的。
#e Why is there an ‘a’?
#c 為什麼有a？
#e Why is there an ‘i’?
#c 為什麼有i？
#e They (want to) do research.
#c 他們是來研究的。
#e T: Right, if they want to learn, they have to practice many times. P: Yes, they (are here to) do research.
#c T: 是的，假如是來學習，應該不斷反覆的說。 P: 是，他是來研究的。
#e If there is an ‘i’, if there is a ‘ka’, if the order of ‘ku’ is reversed, it does not sound correct.
#c 如果有i，如果有ka，如果ku在前，在後，前後顛倒，就不順了。
#e It’s not good.
#c 這樣不可以。
#e It’s not good.
#c 這樣不適合。
